reviews.review_msg: The teacher is OK, and only because of her enthusiasm. Her teaching techniques could be better. I was a language teacher in the past, and she shoud have done better job involvng students in learning proccess and checking homework. After 6 weeks of this course I felt that I just wasted my time...

Online class.Coming up to the midterm and she's only replied to our questions three times in 7 weeks. It took her over 10 days to respond to our problems with the textbook and then she didn't have an answer. Only take this course if you want a hard time or if you're willing to do all the work on your own with no guidance or help from the instructor
